sentences.sContent: Underpinning this success has been an exemplary record of innovation.
sentences.sCn: 支持这一成功的基础是一次堪称典范的革新记录。

synos.tran: 典范的；惩戒性的；可仿效的

remMethod.val: exampl(e) (榜样) + ary (…的) → 榜样的 → 典型的

trans.tranOther: If you describe someone or something as exemplary, you think they are extremely good
